properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 10:03AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River...S.F. of the Forked
Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the S.F. of the Forked Deer River near Halls
* until further notice.
* At 09 AM Tuesday the stage was 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 12.0 feet on Thursday February 13.
* Flood stage is 9.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Monday February 10 and will
continue rising to near 12.0 feet by Tuesday February 11 then
begin falling.
* At 12.5 feet...Water is flowing over Highway 210 north of Halls.
Several low-lying roads near the South Fork of the Forked Deer
River are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Wednesday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
